comment._content: Hiram Johnson (b 1866) was politician, Gov. of California and U.S. Senator, and founder of the PROGRESSIVE PARTY, according to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hiram_Johnson

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Arthur Garford, was a PROGRESSIVE PARTY politician as well as an Ohio industrialist and inventor of the padded bicycle seat (yeah!), according to this article at Wikipedia en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Garford Garford had a nice factory, photo here: omp.ohiolink.edu/OMP/Previews?oid=3082458&count=16&am... He had a nice house also, after all he was "Elyria's premier industrialist"; elyriapride.elyria.com/timemachine/houses.html
